version_description:
• Fixes crashes on some devices.
• Improved fonts.
• Improved "You Won" screen.
• Fix Register screen captcha.

Fixed log-in screen
Stability and performance fixes

- Improved notification support
- Better handling of network issues
- Bug fixes and stability
- Updated payment methods

- Improved handling of phone numbers
- Improved notification support
- Better handling of network issues
- Bug fixes and stability
- Updated payment methods
Now translated to Japanese, German and French
Fixed a bug that could cause the app to hang on the splash screen in iOS 13.
Fixed a bug that could cause the app to hang on the splash screen in iOS 13.

We've been busy improving the SNS app for you to explore a new beginning in the SNS world. What's new?

- Full re-design with updated features
- New release calendar
- SNS Locals: Interviews and more from some of our favorite people in our global community.
- Curated SNS editorials and Projects
- Fast, one-click to all SNS Sign ups
- Improved BOT protection
- Improved payment flow
- Improved notifications
- Fixed stability issues

Update now and step into a brand new SNS experience.

-Bug Fixes
-Fixes an issue where some users on smaller screens would get a blank signup modal.

- SNS Radio is now in the app.
- Improvements to Japanese address input

- Small fixes for Japanese Address Validation
- SNS RADIO player improvements.
